argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_zgz | |- ( A e. ZZ -> A e. Z[i] ) |
| 2 |  | #P_igz | |- _i e. Z[i] |
| 3 |  | #P_zgz | |- ( B e. ZZ -> B e. Z[i] ) |
| 4 |  | #P_gzmulcl | |- ( ( _i e. Z[i] /\ B e. Z[i] ) -> ( _i x. B ) e. Z[i] ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_sylancr | |- ( B e. ZZ -> ( _i x. B ) e. Z[i] ) |
| 6 |  | #P_gzaddcl | |- ( ( A e. Z[i] /\ ( _i x. B ) e. Z[i] ) -> ( A + ( _i x. B ) ) e. Z[i] ) |
| 7 | 1, 5, 6 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( A + ( _i x. B ) ) e. Z[i] ) |
